history.proof: intros m Phi relH. hauto use: @consistent_spec, @ContextProperty_Trivial.maximal_consistent_derivable_closed, @ContextProperty_Trivial.maximal_consistent_spec, @derivable_closed_element_derivable, @sat_falsep unfold: proj1_sig, at_least, falsep.

original: intros m Phi relH. unfold KRIPKE. split. - intros contra. destruct relH as [R Hrel]. pose proof (proj2 (im_bij rel) m Phi R) as Hinj. apply Hinj in Hrel. rewrite Hrel. auto. - intros HinjFF. apply proj1 in relH. rewrite relH in HinjFF. auto.
